import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./Footer-with-map.css"; import { Fade, Rotate, Zoom, Slide, Roll } from "react-reveal"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import profile from "../images/profile.jpg"; import leo from "../images/leo.png"; import acm from "../images/acm.png"; import pcp from "../images/pcp.png"; import { Container, Row, Col, ProgressBar, Carousel, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import Achievements from "./Achievements"; import Projects from "./Projects"; export class Landing extends Component { render() { return (

ABOUT

I am a full-stack developer, currently pursuing B.Tech. in
Computer science and engineering at Jaypee University of Information Technology. I am interested in graphic designing.
I can assist with producing clean and functional design where required. I love listening music and like to play table-tennis.

SKILLS

HTML

CSS

BOOTSTRAP

REACT

ADOBE PHOTOSHOP

PYTHON

FLASK

DJANGO

WORDPRESS

ADOBE ILLUSTRATOR

EXPERIENCE

Director of Literature and Media & Publicity

I am currently working as a director of literature and media & publicity in Omega Leo Club-JUIT. I have been a part of this social organization since august 2018. I am glad that I can contribute to the
society.

Member

I have work experience as a member of ACM-JUIT student branch. I have been a part of organizing committee and have organized various events successfully  as well as took part in events being organized in our university.

INTERESTS

MUSIC

MOVIES

CRICKET
); } } export default Landing;
